transcript.text: It’s up to all of us to keep bribery and corruption from happening here. Click on each heading to confirm what you can do.

contentText.text: At Johnson Controls, we are committed to compliance with all bribery and anti-corruption laws. Here is what that means in practice:

instructionText.text: Select each heading to learn more.
Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.

popText.text: Never offer a business contact anything of value with the intention of influencing their judgment.

Don’t try to conceal or misrepresent spending on entertainment or gifts – record all transactions honestly and accurately. See our Third Party Travel, Gifts and Entertainment Policy for more information.

Make our anti-bribery standards clear to any third parties we work with. Monitor their activity and report any suspicion of corruption. Do not work with business partners who engage in corrupt practices.
If you are responsible for managing third parties, ensure that they are fully approved as per Johnson Controls’ Third Party Program requirements.
